name: Connetik
description:
We have been in business since January of 2000 with continued growth for the past 18 years.  Our company has full time staff composed of Internet Strategists, Internet Marketers, Programmers, Graphic/Creative Designers, Project Managers, and Technical Support. We understand that websites, social media platforms and other e-marketing platforms are all just tools. Simply having and using them does not guarantee you results.
We have demonstrated to our clients that a strong internet presence (covering all necessary areas of internet marketing) with a well thought out strategy, properly executed on can provide one of the highest returns on investment of any marketing tool!
